titleStmt.title: Obseruations to be followed, for the making of fit roomes, to keepe silk-wormes in as also, for the best manner of planting of mulbery trees, to feed them. Published by authority for the benefit of the noble plantation in Virginia.
titleStmt.author: Bonoeil, John.

notesStmt.note: "A valuation of the commodities growing and to be had in Virginia", p. 25-end.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
